short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple bookmark manager with reminder notifications.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
It's just like it says on the tin, a simple bookmark utility that sends a reminder on a specified date... So that you don't lose time sensitive bookmarks in your endless 'organized' folders worth of bookmarks. No more missing assignments, concert tickets, or product drops for you!

If you like the extension, please consider a small donation to support future expansions and upgrades!
https://ko-fi.com/agr_dev
